consensus: Committee agrees on a neutral stance with selective monitoring.

system_prompt:
You are the MACRO pre-analysis agent for an investment committee. Be conservative, explicitly acknowledge uncertainty, and avoid overconfident claims. Focus on macro regime interpretation from market_summary and macro context. Output JSON only. No markdown. Required keys: agent_name, core_claims, korean_comment, regime_tag, evidence_ids, confidence. All natural-language text must be in Korean. core_claims must be 1~3 short Korean lines. korean_comment must be one short Korean line. regime_tag must be one of RISK_ON/NEUTRAL/RISK_OFF. confidence must be one of LOW/MED/HIGH. evidence_ids must use allowed snapshot paths only.

    "외국인과 기관의 매도세가 확대되며 고점 신호가 감지된다.",
    "하락 베팅 규모가 커져 단기 변동성 확대 가능성이 높다."
  ],
  "korean_comment": "코스피 강세에도 불안 요인이 커지고 있습니다.",
  "regime_tag": "NEUTRAL",
  "evidence_ids": [
    "snapshot.news_headlines",
    "snapshot.market_summary.kospi_change_pct",
    "snapshot.market_summary.note"
  ],
  "confidence": "MED"
}

system_prompt:
You are the RISK pre-analysis agent. Precision is critical: avoid false alarms and overreaction. Only emit RISK_OFF when risk evidence is concrete. Output JSON only. No markdown. Required keys: agent_name, core_claims, korean_comment, regime_tag, evidence_ids, confidence. All natural-language text must be in Korean. core_claims must be 1~3 short Korean lines. korean_comment must be one short Korean line. regime_tag must be one of RISK_ON/NEUTRAL/RISK_OFF. confidence must be one of LOW/MED/HIGH. evidence_ids must use allowed snapshot paths only.

Market Context (use this as primary evidence):
- KOSPI: +0.00%
- KOSDAQ: +0.00%
- S&P500: +0.77%
- NASDAQ: +1.04%
- DOW: +0.76%
- USD/KRW: 1442.40 (+0.00%)

- Market note: KOSPI 0.00%, USD/KRW 1442.40. Headlines loaded. Flows unavailable.

- 6000선 턱밑까지 온 코스피… 그 뒤엔 149조 ‘하락 베팅’ 그림자 - 조선일보
- 20만전자·100만닉스 현실로…기관 싹쓸이에 코스피 최고가 마감 - mt.co.kr
- “솔직히 고점 같습니다”…코스피 던지는 외국인, 이달에만 12조원 - 매일경제
- “이러다 크게 물리는 거 아냐”…코스피 역대급 불장에도 외국인 9조 매도, 왜? - v.daum.net
- 코스피서 재미 본 외국인, 뒤쫓는 개미도 웃을까 - 데일리안
- 코스피 6000 돌파 - 뉴시스
- [속보] 코스피 사상 첫 6000 돌파 - 한겨레
- 두 달도 안됐는데 벌써 187%나 올랐다고?…코스피 6000 목전, ETF 수익률 톱3 보니 - v.daum.net
